replies.body:
1. Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone.
If your going to make a thread were you want people to be aware of his birthday please just make it in to a Ama or something to involve the community.  I do wish Lokigh a very happy birthday but we can't have the forums being spammed with self-oriented topic can we now?

Locking
